full_summary:
================================
**Tender Announcement: Laundry Services**

**Reference Number:** WS3620730852-Doc3714060949

**Publication Date:** 2022-10-25

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-29, 14:00 HNE

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting Contractors to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Laundry Services.

**Subject:** Provision of Laundry Services

**Objective:** The successful contractor will be required to provide on-site laundry services for the Department of National Defence located in St-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Québec, Canada.

**Key Information:**

* **Location:** St-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Québec, Canada
* **Acquisition Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity Information:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Stephane Dube (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: stephane.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Bid Submission:**

* All bid submissions must be received by 14:00 HNE on 2022-11-29.
* Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

Please refer to Annex A for detailed specifications and requirements. Bid submissions may be made through the online procurement platform at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14460071?extsite=MTQ0NjAwNzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14460071?extsite=MTQ0NjAwNzFfQU4w
